MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart, affecting properties in Garlieston and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to difficulties locating the fault and we now expect your supply to be restored by 7:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:52pm on Saturday, 31 October 2020
